turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order pizzas form Bella Luna's Pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order four medium thick crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have one that's a Veggie Lovers pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a one of that's a four cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Hawaiian pizza for my third?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In the fourth, can I get a black olive and pineapple pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium thick crust pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 4 cheese pizza, 1 hawaiin, and 1 black olives and pineapple pizza, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to pick my order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's about it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
